name: Flight of the Baby Princess
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: I accidentally deleted the UI explaining this, but where you aim your mouse cursor affects what direction you toss Kaguya. Hit her at crazy angles and from high heights to get mad cash!

A modernized and revolutionary retelling of a folklore classic.
Toss baby get money.

A/D - Move
W/Space - Jump / Wall Jump
S - Fall Faster
Point and Click - Toss the baby

Keep her in the air for big bucks!!

also pressing E repeatedly makes the game harder and i forgot to take it out so hard mode i guess ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
